newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $72 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $72 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady in light test. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers.
Sales confirmed on 400 slaughter steers and 100 heifers; 31,400 head confirmed for week to date which includes 15,600 formulated and 800 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 72.00. Pen Select and Choice 1-3 1200 lb Holsteins 64.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 72.00.
Confirmed - 500 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 6,100
Wk to date - 31,400 Week Ago - 13,300 Year Ago - 20,700
